rows.label: tev035801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Vyponne about her work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Vyponne about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Vyponne about the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: tev035801_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Vyponne about the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Sparkly! Sparkly! You're all so beautiful again today,
are you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Oh! I bet you just heard me say something strange to
myself, didn't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, it's a fairly important job, actually?
Hee hee! I'll tell you about it soon enough...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0008
rows.name:
My daughter Panyar just just LOVES human fashion,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0009
rows.name:
But no matter what she tries on, it ends up clashing.
Human clothes and Ma-non bodies just don't seem
to match quite right, I suppose?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0010
rows.name:
But Panyar is no quitterâ€”I believe she decided to to
go to the commercial district to find a Ma-non-
compatible wardrobe? I hope she has good luck...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0015
rows.name:
Do you see that thing sparkling in the middle of the
room?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0016
rows.name:
That's the Ma-non ship's power source, you see?
It is most precious to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0017
rows.name:
The energy it produces gets converted into a more
usable form by devices in the ship's hull, if you follow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Ah! I can see this interests you! I know this because
your face is starting to sparkle too, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0025
rows.name:
The sparklies are the source of the ship's energy,
okay? And the sparklies are alive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0026
rows.name:
Ma-non ships use the energy emitted by the sparklies
when they're happy, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0027
rows.name:
They're more powerful and ecologically sound than any
of of your human energy sources. Impressive, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0028
rows.name:
We found them 500 light-years away, you see?
Far far far far far FAR across the cosmos.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0029
rows.name:
Uh-oh. The sparklies don't like it when I talk about
old times, do they? Well, I don't want them upset,
so I'm going to to stop now, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Vyponne about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0011
rows.name:
Thank you for looking out for for Panyar.
It pleases a mother to see her daughter find a
worthwhile career path, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Did you know she gave me a bottle of this "perfume"
substance as a thank-you for helping out with with the
measurements?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0013
rows.name:
It tastes so bitter, but I suppose one must suffer for the
sake of beauty, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035801_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Hmm? It's not for drinking?! BLEEEEEEEEECH!
Maybe you should write that on the label next time,
don't you think?![ST:wait ]
